text: The researchers analyzed a large dataset to determine whether the treatment improved patient outcomes.
Air quality measurements collected over five years show a steady decline in particulate pollution.
We justified the policy change using data from national surveys and census records.
The model’s predictions were validated against real-world data from hospital admissions.
According to the latest sales data, demand increased sharply after the price reduction.
The aircraft’s pitot tube sensor measures airspeed and feeds the data to the flight computer.
A motion sensor in the hallway turns on the lights when someone walks by.
The doctor attached a pulse oximeter sensor to monitor the patient’s blood oxygen level.
Soil moisture sensors in the field help farmers decide when to irrigate.
The smartwatch uses optical sensors to track heart rate during exercise.
